<a id="AudioEffectInstance"></a>

# AudioEffectInstance

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance](AudioEffectSpectrumAnalyzerInstance.md)

Manipulates the audio it receives for a given effect.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An audio effect instance manipulates the audio it receives for a given effect. This instance is automatically created by an [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) when it is added to a bus, and should usually not be created directly. If necessary, it can be fetched at run-time with [AudioServer.get_bus_effect_instance()](AudioServer.md#AudioServer_method_get_bus_effect_instance).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_process**\ (\ src_buffer\: `const void*`, dst_buffer\: `AudioFrame*`, frame_count\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="required">required</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process)

Called by the [AudioServer](AudioServer.md) to process this effect. When [_process_silence()](AudioEffectInstance.md#AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process_silence) is not overridden or it returns ``false``, this method is called only when the bus is active.

\ **Note:** It is not useful to override this method in GDScript or C#. Only GDExtension can take advantage of it.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process_silence"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_process_silence**\ (\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process_silence)

Override this method to customize the processing behavior of this effect instance.

Should return ``true`` to force the [AudioServer](AudioServer.md) to always call [_process()](AudioEffectInstance.md#AudioEffectInstance_private_method__process), even if the bus has been muted or cannot otherwise be heard.
